definitions.text: (often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
examples: he made a mint on the stock market
see the rest of the winners in our huge passel of photos

definitions.text: any north temperate plant of the genus Mentha with aromatic leaves and small mauve flowers
any member of the mint family of plants
the leaves of a mint plant used fresh or candied
a candy that is flavored with a mint oil
a plant where money is coined by authority of the government
form by stamping, punching, or printing
